term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - phase I reaction of biotransformation
term.title: phase I reaction

item.text: Enzymic modification of a substance by oxidation, reduction, hydrolysis, hydration, dehydrochlorination, or other reactions catalyzed by enzymes of the cytosol, of the endoplasmic reticulum (microsomal enzymes) or of other cell organelles.

sources.item: PAC, 2004, 76, 1033. 'Glossary of terms used in toxicokinetics (IUPAC Recommendations 2003)' on page 1064 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac200476051033)
